replies.body: Super Enchanted Trushot Crystal Barrage Rocket, presented by Stark Industries.
Just need some draven axes in there now
I just gotta know, who got the kill credit?

Needs Draven and Karthus R.

Full team of Global ults!!!!

Anyone else notice most of the global ulter's are ADCs?
I think that was intentional. Keeps rage low when that other guy somehow outruns you with a sliver of health left and your ult is ready.
needs some music to go along with the clip... i know! {{champion:30}}
rocket should have come a bit later. It's set up as an execution move, after all
I'm guessing they intended them to land at the same time. And the rocket has the fastest bullet speed. Hence why it hits first, despite being the last to converge.
